page.title: 09Employment
page.content:
Our parents work. 7 fathers are in farming,one is a barrister,one owns a gents clothing shop in Newcastle,one works at a local brick works and one is a salesman. One mother has a full-time job working in a retired peoples home as an Auxilliary Nurse. Two mothers have part-time jobs,one as a Bank Clerk during the Summer,
and the other as a Hairdresser at home. Because there are not so many employed in agriculture nowadays some young people have to leave the area for work. Harden Quarry employs men and many wagon drivers work from there, but none live in this area.
